text: Cork: Robert Hooke “I no sooner discerned these (which were indeed the first microscopical pores I have ever saw...) but me thought I had with the discovery of them, perfectly hinted to me the true and intelligible reason for all the phenomena of cork” Micrographia (1665) Image is in the public domain. Source Wikimedia Commons. Hooke: first to use the term “cell”, from Latin “cella” a small compartment 2
